LanguageData.Silicon.label: silicon
LanguageData.Silicon.description: Silicon is the one of the most common elements in the universe by mass, but very rarely occurs as the pure free element in nature. It can be produced by smelting Sand。
LanguageData.Biomatter.label: biomatter
LanguageData.Biomatter.description: BioMatter can be extracted from a humanlike corpse. It can be used to grow natural organs in an Organ Vat。
LanguageData.ArtificialBone.label: artificial bone
LanguageData.ArtificialBone.description: A carefully crafted synthetic bone piece. It is useful for repairing damaged bones。
LanguageData.Ash.label: ash
LanguageData.Ash.description: Ash is obtained by burning corpses or other materials in a crematorium or fire pit。
LanguageData.ConcreteResource.label: concrete
LanguageData.ConcreteResource.description: Concrete is a composite material composed of sand and rubble. It is a fluid material that bonds into a solid material over time. It can have metals added to create reinforced concrete, a durable and solid building material。
LanguageData.ClayBrick.label: clay bricks
LanguageData.ClayBrick.description: A brick of hardened clay baked at a kiln. It can be used for construction purposes。
LanguageData.Ceramics.label: Ceramics
LanguageData.Ceramics.description: Glazed ceramics made using high-temperature kiln. Smooth and beautiful but fragile。
LanguageData.Matter.label: inorganic matter
LanguageData.Matter.description: A container of inorganic matter. It can be made at an inorganic matter converter from various types of raw resources or refined into specific resources. It can be used to feed a hadron collider for antimatter production。
LanguageData.PileOfBooks.label: pile of books
LanguageData.PileOfBooks.description: A random assortment of books. Most are old and discarded classics, but occasionally a good quality book can be found。
LanguageData.PaintingSupplies.label: painting supplies
LanguageData.PaintingSupplies.description: A large assortment of brushes and paints. Perfect for any aspiring artist。
LanguageData.MineralSonarModule.label: mineral sonar module
LanguageData.MineralSonarModule.description: This is a mineral sonar module. When deployed on the field with some energy packs, it can scan the surrounding area for metallic objects or hidden deposits of ores。
LanguageData.ThrumboHorn.label: thrumbo horn
LanguageData.ThrumboHorn.description: The horn from a previously living thrumbo. It's razor-sharp, very hard and priceless in most markets. This is a true trophy。
LanguageData.ThrumboHorn.tools.0.label: edge
LanguageData.ThrumboHorn.tools.1.label: point
LanguageData.ThrumboHorn.tools.2.label: base
LanguageData.ElephantTusk.label: elephant tusk
LanguageData.ElephantTusk.description: An elephant's tusk. Very durable and valuable. Deadly but somewhat unwieldy as a weapon。
LanguageData.ElephantTusk.tools.0.label: edge
LanguageData.ElephantTusk.tools.1.label: point
LanguageData.ElephantTusk.tools.2.label: base
LanguageData.RobotParts.label: robot parts
LanguageData.RobotParts.description: These parts could be used to create a robot。
LanguageData.MendingKit.label: mending kit
LanguageData.MendingKit.description: Miscellaneous cloth, bits and parts. Necessary for repairing weapons and mending apparel。
LanguageData.DepletedUraniumCore.label: depleted uranium core
